dt2.11:4.2: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.11:4.3: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:4.4: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:4.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:5.2: purisindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.11:5.5: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:6.4: domanassindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.11:6.6: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:6.9: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:7.1: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.11:7.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:7.5: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:8.14: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:8.15: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:8.17: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:9.1: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.11:9.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:10.3: domanassena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.11:10.4: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:10.7: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:11.14: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:11.15: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:11.17: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:11.18: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:11.27: kilesehi ceva saṃkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:11.28: kilesehi ceva saṃkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:11.29: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.11:11.30: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:11.31: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:11.33: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
